mapper.insert: insert into category values(null, '기타', null, now(), #{id});
mapper.select: select no, name, description, blog_id as blogId from category where blog_id = #{id};

select a.name, ifnull(count, 0) as postCount, a.description from category a left join (select category_no, count(*) as count from post group by category_no) b on a.no = b.category_no where a.blog_id = #{id};
